entry.title: Poland's President Addresses Ukraine's Parliament, Calls for Removal of All Russian Troops
entry.content: In a surprise visit to Kyiv, Andrzej Duda said that only Ukraine should decide any terms upon which it pursues peace with Moscow.

entry.title: 'Why Did You Do This?' The Story Behind Ukraine's First War-Crimes Trial
entry.content: A verdict is expected Monday in the closely watched war-crimes trial of Russian Sgt. Vadim Shishimarin. This account, based on witness testimony, reconstructs the events leading to his killing of a civilian.

entry.title: Swedes Ask if NATO Membership and Peacemaking Can Coexist
entry.content: For two centuries, Sweden has shunned military alliances. Its decision last week to seek accession to NATO ends that, fundamentally altering the Scandinavian country’s security posture.
